tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Train_Performance (
    train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    speed FLOAT,
    delay_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE trains (
    train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_name VARCHAR(100),
    route_id INT,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_station VARCHAR(100),
    end_station VARCHAR(100),
    distance_km FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Trains (
  train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  train_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  production_year INT,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  distance_km FLOAT,
  starting_station VARCHAR(255),
  ending_station VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  train_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  speed_kmh FLOAT,
  delay_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE trains (
  train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  train_name VARCHAR(50),
  train_type VARCHAR(20),
  departure_time TIME,
  arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  train_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  date DATE,
  speed FLOAT,
  delay INT
);

CREATE TABLE trains (
    train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_name VARCHAR(50),
    route_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_id INT,
    route_id INT,
    date DATE,
    speed FLOAT,
    delay INT,
);

CREATE TABLE train_station_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_id INT,
    station_id INT,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
);
